import React, {useContext} from 'react'; import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png' import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_dull_icon.png' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; const {addToCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

{product.name}

(122)

KES {product.old_price}
KES {product.new_price}
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dolorem ut voluptate, veniam vel mollitia dolor laudantium velit sunt illo odio, itaque quaerat molestias ullam rem cum praesentium aliquam fuga culpa.

Select Colour

Yellow
Black
Blue

White

Category : Toys, Children, Fun

Tags : Modern, Latest, Slick

); } export default ProductDisplay;
